name: 施欣文
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

scorePolicy: Your active engagement in class contributes to your participation grade, and unexcused absences and tardies negatively affect your participation grade. Not only do tardies lower your participation grade, if frequent, they will count as half an absence. Plan to arrive on time and be prepared to work during the entire class period. Coming to class late, wandering in and out of class, and leaving class early all disrupt class discussion and activities. In addition, you may miss important class announcements, assignments, and quizzes. Please keep in mind that if you have six unexcused absences, you will fail the course. Also, attendance requires your presence in both body and mind. If you are not prepared to participate and engage in class discussion and activities, you may be counted absent.
